phrases: Fried chicken and rolled omelette should be fine, right?
And maybe sweet and spicy kinpira...
It has to be a cute lunch, or else.
Maybe you do not get it.
The moment you open it, it is like, Ta-daaa!
But he is a middle school boy, right?
And if it is after a game,
I would think delicious-looking is better than cute.
You are good with your hands, Kiriyama.
I am glad I asked you to come over.
The baseball team from Hina's middle school is having a game.
I have never eaten boiled chestnuts before.
But you can eat this inner brown skin, huh?
You have to boil it for a while, though.
It keeps well, so it is the perfect winter snack.
And it seems the boy Hina is concerned about will be playing in the game.
He is the son of the milkman.
It is like he drank every drop from his parent's milk shop.
He was even shorter than Hina back in elementary school.
And now he is the baseball team's ace and the idol of Hina's school.
So it seems Hina wants to give this boy
named Takahashi, who she is concerned about, a homemade lunch.
You have got more competition now, huh?
Even though Hina's had a crush on Takahashi since elementary school.
Do not say it like it is that kind of thing!
And it is the night before this young lady's big event, playing out before my very eyes.
While I peel the skin off of chestnuts that are due to be boiled.
Pumpkin croquettes shaped like apples and a flower bed made of onigiri...
Boil the pumpkin, mash it, form it into balls, cover them with flour,
then coat them with egg yolk and bread crumbs...
If you leave the house at 9:30...
If you make something you have never made before, I think it is risky.
You will not know how long it will take, and it will make you panic.
If you panic, you will make mistakes, like with the seasoning...
Like I said, fried chicken, rolled omelette,
and if you want something red, maybe cherry tomatoes.
Is there anything I can eat, meow?
No way, that is too normal!
It is like an old woman's lunch!
I am going to decide on this one!
Go ahead, do what you want!
I will not give you anymore advice!
Oh no, it is already this late?
I want to buy all this, but I do not have enough money.
Chestnut pumpkin, ground beef, breadcrumbs, onions, eggs,
black pepper, radishes, olives, avocado, asparagus, baby corn,
balsamic vinegar, lemons, mushroom, red and yellow bell peppers,
king oyster mushrooms, fresh basil, decorative cups and toothpicks, rosemary...
How much do you intend to make?
Or more like, how much do you intend to spend?
At a glance, this will cost over 3,000 yen.
It is like a box lunch from a fancy restaurant!
Why do we have to take 3,000 yen from our food expenses for some other kid's lunch?
And we only buy milk when it is on sale for 158 yen!
What, you say some other kid,
but are not the cats and Kiriyama the same?!
Why do you get to use up all the money on some other peoples' kids?
Rei, are you someone else's kid?
You are not Momo's big brother?
No, I am the one who is sorry.
I tried to pay for my share of the food before, but Akari would not let me.
But maybe now she will, starting with this.
Then I will not feel so guilty about things.
Sis will pick up any kind of stray.
She cannot ignore something that is just skin and bones.
And then, she likes to make them soft and fluffy.
But I was surprised when she brought a person home.
I am sure Sis will make you soft and fluffy in no time.
I just rolled the croquettes into balls!
I have to do it over!
I was so focused on lunch, I did not think about my outfit!
This looks like I am way too enthusiastic!
Curtains are more expensive than I thought.
But now I will finally be able to sleep peacefully.
I do not have any matches for a while, so this is a good opportunity to start
gathering things I need for the apartment.
I still need a chair, a desk, a bookshelf...
So that is the rumored Takahashi?
Is he really a middle school student?
I wonder if she finished his lunch in time.
I love you! - You are the best!
He really hit it out of the park...
He totally looks like a main character from a shonen manga.
I have never seen Hina with that expression before.
It really looks like springtime in her life...
Or like she is in love.
Okay, get dressed, and we will meet at Matsuda.
- Come on, Takahashi, let us go!
But, Sis will ask me about it.
She will ask me why I did not give it to him, after all that trouble I went through.
It is because she is so beautiful.
She is good at cooking, and I am sure anyone would be happy to have a bento she made...
Yesterday evening and even just now, she looked so happy.
Let us go home and eat it with everyone.
You could not give it to him.
The same thing happened to me before, too.
You were not able to give a lunch you made, Sis?
Of course, just like you, Hina.
I wanted to make a cute lunch and I got so excited.
I worked hard, but I panicked, and then I messed up.
So I could not help but say something.
What I said to you last night is what Mom told me a long time ago.
Like mother, like daughter, I guess you could say.
Well, let us eat it with everyone.
Maybe they were so full they got sleepy.
Hina, did you taste this beforehand?
This was something bitter, sweet, and sour.
It indeed tasted like the end of a first love.
Hina, let us do some training together.
I will do my best next time for sure!
Maybe it is a good thing that she was not able to deliver her first bento.
That is what Kiriyama and I thought.
Um... I am the one who won, right?
You could say that, as a phenomenon.
If that is what makes you feel better.
It sounds like you are objecting, like, Yeah, yeah, it cannot be helped.
I will start with a static rook and you do the bishop exchange once more.
It is like I am a practice board!
With the bishop exchange, I cannot let you have everything your way!
Then you should use the ranging rook.
I like using the static rook!
Would you have me use a strategy I am not good at?
How many times have I told you that studying alone suits me better?
As rivals, we raise each other up,
so losing this precious rivalry would be a major loss to your shogi life!
You do understand that, do not you, Kiriyama?
I am saying the two of us need to find it, without a moment to waste.
In fact, you are the one who has to find it.
The bishop exchange crusher silver bullet...
In that case, it would be the Kiriyama Vaccine!
It is what I have dreamed of!
To leave a technique with my name for the next generation!
I understand... but I would rather not!
You suddenly show up at 9 in the morning, talking about developing a silver bullet?
And besides, I am an all-rounder, so I have nothing to do with it.
Are you even listening to me?
What are we going to eat?
You would probably like the GigaMec.
What do you always eat, Kiriyama?
When I am alone, I eat bread, Smiley's Bento, Mec's, or Yoshidaya's beef bowl...
But lately, I sometimes have dinner at an acquaintance's house...
It sounded like this one yelled Bodoro at me.
The super-popular anime masterpiece loved by children, adults,
and yours truly, about an intelligent being who lives in the mysterious forest.
Well, I do feel a deep connection to that character's intelligence.
I shall ask you your name.
Traffic is dangerous here with all the cars going to and fro.
More than when she is with me...
Do not tell me Akari has a weakness...
I am Kiriyama's best friend, Harunobu Nikaidou.
You should come over as well.
It is like a movie set.
Nothing for you to apologize, Hina...
What can I say, your wonderful friend is just like a nice, round, shiny ball.
I have never heard anyone describe a friend like that.
Sis is extremely fond of soft and fluffy things.
What would you like to eat?
We went grocery shopping today, so I can make pretty much anything.
If you could make something bland and light on protein...
It is impossible to maintain a plump body like that with such a strict menu.
If he diets, that beautiful ball-like shine would...
Ah, but I see, I would worry about it, too.
Or maybe the situation is even more serious?
No matter how appealingly soft and fluffy he is, it will not mean a thing unless he is healthy!
You promised you would not say that, remember?
I hate to say it, Akari.
But I cannot have melon or bamboo shoots.
I do not know what to eat these days.
They said I could have just a little.
Okay, I will look into mild-tasting snacks for you.
I did not take care of Grandma, and listen to my customers at the club just for show!
Season it as you like, Nikaidou.
Chew well and eat slowly, okay?
Got hooked in, and also chewing well
My butler is always telling me to chew each bite at least 30 times,
but I am always too impatient.
Not being cared for by Akari, so somewhat sad beings...
Who it could be at this hour?
I am sorry to disturb you so late this evening.
It seems Young Master has been enjoying your hospitality.
Are you here to pick me up?
I am surprised you found your way here.
Of course, I used a GPS
Anyway, I happened to be passing by.
He always comes to pick me up, no matter where I am.
It is always been like that.
Um, if you would like, please enjoy this.
It is from the neighborhood, so you may already know it,
but this is one of my favorite sweets.
Um, will not you come in and have these with us?
Oh, if you do not mind.
Hina, would you boil some water?
He was my dad's best friend.
Even though he is an adult, he really talked to me.
Watch the next episode of March Comes in Like a Lion, too!
I swear I will not mess up the next bento!
